messages.message:
I am working with large 250 page documents.  When I ask a question of the document it seems to only return information from the last half of the document.  Are there any prompt hints for getting ALL the information across all pages of the document?
If I ask the following question on just the first 120 pages I get one answer that is accurate but when asking the complete document I get a different subset of the total answer:
prompt: list all the patients medications discontinued and current along with the related diagnosis for all patient medical conditions

we currently don't have the ability to "extract all" -- model works on selected chunks given limited context window. there's an internal only feature we are rolling out in August is a step towards solving the "extract all" problem. are you able to share your doc with us @Dale Swan? cc @vineeth @Rafal for agent / advanced converse next step

there's an existing EPD initiative ticket on this, currently slotted sometime in October https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-360?filter=10527
